summary: Implemented RU/ZH/JA/TR entries in `frontend/src/i18n/languages.ts`, but did not implement Add Bench modal localization or add translation dictionaries for the new languages. An unrelated `project_state.json` update was included.

missing_requirements.requirement: Localize the entire “Add bench” modal flow by replacing all user-facing strings in `frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/AddBenchModal.tsx` with `useI18n().t(...)` calls and adding any missing translation keys (including labels, placeholders, helper/validation text, buttons, loading/uploading text, toast messages).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no modifications to `AddBenchModal.tsx` and no evidence of string replacements or new translation keys being added for the modal.
evidence: <file-diff>: only 2 modified files listed; `frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/AddBenchModal.tsx` not among them

missing_requirements.requirement: Add RU/ZH/JA/TR support by extending `frontend/src/i18n/languages.ts` AND extending `frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts` with complete dictionaries for the new languages for all existing `TranslationKey` entries (plus any new Add Bench keys).
missing_requirements.reason: `languages.ts` was updated with the new language codes, but `frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts` was not modified/added in the diff, so the required translation dictionaries are missing.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated `project_state.json` with new_feature_requests entries unrelated to runtime localization implementation.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asked for frontend i18n changes (AddBenchModal localization, languages.ts, translations.ts). Modifying `project_state.json` is not requested and does not contribute to the specified acceptance criteria.
